This package contains a number of functions to analyse FARS data,US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's Fatality Analysis Reporting System. It is a nationwide census providing the American public yearly data regarding fatal injuries suffered in motor vehicle traffic crashes.

## Details

See https://www.nhtsa.gov/research-data/fatality-analysis-reporting-system-fars for more details.
